favourite.article: The triune God dispensing Himself in to us, is His economy - His plan.
Am the branch and You're the VINE. Amen.

I love this hymn! God dispensing Him economy in His Trinity! The Father is the source the Son is the course and the Spirit is the flow, flowing God into us dispensing His economy! The divine economy is God's plan to dispense Christ into His chosen people to produce constitute and build up the organic Body of Christ!
It's so amazing song, just open ourselves to take His constant dispensing.

As we abide in Him all His riches are being transfused into us. This is an unprecedented economy. Lord, thank You for such a dispencong, such a plan. Thank You that we're included into it and we're given the economy of grace.

His dispensing is little by little, day by day, here a little, there a little, morning by morning, strength to strength, grace upon grace, from glory to glory. Our destiny is to live a normal life in the divine dispensing; it is a blessing to be satisfied with ordinary days in the divine dispensing. Lord, fill our ordinary, routine days with Your divine dispensing.
Lord, thank You for such a dispensing.
HE IS IN US AS WE ARE IN HIM. WE ALL MUST HAVE THIS WONDERFUL FELLOWSHIP. O LORD, AMEN, HALLELUJAH!!
Ohhhhhhhhhhhhh Lord Jesus! Thank You for Your dispensing, Your economy, in Your Trinity, Your transfusing, and Your mingling. All Yours is to me.
As I'm loving You and enjoying You, Lord, You become in me the rhema word. Here I'll pray in You as You pray in me. You'll bear fruit in me, Lord, abundantly. amen amen amen
i like this song because I love God. Amen, Amen, Amen.
Lord.. my Lord Jesus.. Now I'm just in You.. Whenever I return to You, You give me new happiness, hope, place. I wanna be always in You-my ownerâ™¡

I am just a branch and You're the vine as I dwell in You everything is fine here I'd like to be, Lord all the time. Here I'm Yours dear Lord and You are mine. Gods dispensing His economy in His Trinity. He's tranfusing and He's mingling all He is to me! Oh Lord Jesus I love You!
Just to be in You, as You're in me! This is one of my favourite hymns. Whenever I listen to this hymn, I will just call, "O Lord I am one with You as You're to me! I love You Lord!
